Text.Page:
The {@LinkCreature:4#1051#devan war golems} and {@LinkCreature:4#1052#fallen devan protectors} are walking around like they own the place.

Kill them, and if there are shadmetal parts in their armor, take them.

Fyrmount is our mine, . Show them...by mining them.
Still standing, eh? Keep this up, and we'll be back in the mines before you know it, <PCNAME>.
Blast and damnation! It doesn't bother you, having the enemy wandering around like they own the place?
